document.full_text: the jury in the high-profile raj rajaratnam insider trading trial heard plenty of racy language on phone taps on monday, even though the judge had deleted portions as being too risque.
document.title: rajaratnam-chiesi phone taps spice up trial
lines_and_colors: the jury in the high-profile raj rajaratnam insider trading trial heard plenty of racy language on phone taps on monday, even though the judge had deleted portions as being too risque.
